channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Constant littering on grass verges and gutter area, 29th October
item.description:
Always littering here along gutter and verge as one of the main routes on and off the estate including beer cans, lunch litter, fag butts etc, could we get some council anti-litter signage up on bridge near entrance to estate
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Streetlights have been out for a long time and the allocated attendance from NGED must has elapsed by now, 29th October
item.description:
This is very dangerous and this should be prioritized as it very dangerous. Please can I be called and updated.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Francis Street, Naunton, Cheltenham

item.title: Raised cracked uneven path, 29th October
item.description:
The path is raised cracked and uneven to the extent my mother tripped and broke her ankle, please can you come out dig up and relay.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Paynes Pitch, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
